review: The device came as stated. It works just fine. A couple gripes I have with it.The UI is very cluttered. It needs to be more simplified in my opinion. It's not that it makes it hard to use, it's just too much on the screen at once.I have an Amazon Echo and it would be nice if it was integrated with it or the Amazon voice remote.I'm not sure if this is possible but being able to use a Bluetooth speaker with it would be great as well.
